name: UK CPM
description:
CPM is a multi-award winning sales agency and for over 75 years we’ve been driving profitable sales and growth for our clients’ brands. Our track record of success across many sectors - including FMCG, Technology, Financial Services, Utilities and Automotive is unrivalled. We have become the global market leader in outsourced sales and a leading contact centre provider.
 This makes us the only sales agency in the UK to deliver integrated solutions that include face-to-face, phone and digital communications. CPM’s talent pool is made up of highly experienced sector and channel professionals who are recognised by our clients - including Walmart, P+G, HP, Mercedes Benz, Royal Mail and Virgin group – as the best people in our industry for delivering world-class sales solutions. CPM is owned by the world’s largest marketing communications group, Omnicom.
